mapper.select: SELECT id, address, detail_address, user_id, default_address, address_name, postal_code FROM address WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address ( address, detail_address, user_id, default_address, address_name, postal_code ) VALUES ( #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{userId}, #{defaultAddress}, #{addressName}, #{postalCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, default_address = #{defaultAddress}, address_name = #{addressName}, postal_code = #{postalCode} WHERE id = #{id}
